physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Mildly obese Caucasian female, fully alert and cooperative, but appeared vague and easily distracted. Noted to have alopecia universalis and widespread scattered vitiligo.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initial presentation with progressive alopecia that resulted in total body hair loss over 2 years. Development of severe memory impairment and functional disability noted over time.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Clinical examination was unremarkable, with normal body habitus and body hair, no abnormality of skin pigmentation.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: No changes reported during this examination.
